subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Sammy Sosa, playing for the Texas Rangers following a year out of baseball, hit a 1-2 pitch into his team’s bullpen in right-center field for his 600th career home run.
snippet: Sammy Sosa, playing for the Texas Rangers following a year out of baseball, hit a 1-2 pitch into his team’s bullpen in right-center field for his 600th career home run.
